note:
https://ITwrx.org

I intend to post, and follow people who post about programming, FOSS, Ganoo+Linox, Linux, BSDs, server admin, infosec, privacy, and other computer, IT stuff with this account. I often repeat other FOSS project-related posts, or otherwise try to spread the word (links on my sites, posts elsewhere, etc), and would appreciate if that were reciprocated for my projects/project-related posts. IMO, FOSS devs/projects and users should work together to get freedom and privacy-respecting work funded!

Currently using #fedora on desktop, #alpine on servers, and #alpine and #OpenBSD on firewalls.

Currently using #nimlang for web and desktop applications, although web with #nim is still in trial/testing phase.
